        "Schedule additional ultrasound",

        { label: "Memory Function", value: "Stable", change: 2 },

        "Monitor for behavioral changes"

      timeline: [

        { date: "2023-10-25", event: "MMSE: 24/30" },
        { date: "2024-01-25", event: "MMSE: 24/30" }

    {

        "Monitor for side effects",
